last_episode_to_air.name: In the Name of the Father
last_episode_to_air.overview: Dara ruthlessly pushes on to decimate Pathan and Anna in an end game. But finally, to escape arrest Dara must make the ultimate sacrifice.

name: Bambai Meri Jaan
overview: Bambai Meri Jaan chronicles the life of gangster Dara Kadri through the eyes of his father, an ex-cop, Ismail Kadri. In this season, we see how Dara puts everything at stake including his family as he goes on to become a cold-blooded, fearless gangster who uses his business acumen to fight not only the police and his rivals but also his own demons along the way.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: Bambai Meri Jaan chronicles the life of gangster Dara Kadri through the eyes of his father, an ex-cop, Ismail Kadri. In this season, we see how Dara puts everything on the line, including his family. He goes on to become a cold-blooded, fearless gangster who uses his business acumen to fight not only the police and his rivals but also his own demons along the way.

tagline: Two men. Bound by Blood. Divided by belief. A city burns in between...

episodes.name: Genesis
episodes.overview: Ismail Kadri, an honest police officer and a devout family man, is tasked with exposing the criminal nexus between gangsters Haji and Pathan.

episodes.name: Paradise Lost
episodes.overview: Ismail’s honesty is challenged. At home he tries to discipline Dara and faces a crisis that puts his integrity and livelihood at stake.

episodes.name: Fall from Grace
episodes.overview: As Ismail struggles to make ends meet for his family, the financial strain starts to influence Dara’s worldview. When Ismail is pushed to breaking point, Haji tightens his grip on him.

episodes.name: Prodigal Son
episodes.overview: Twelve years later, it’s 1977. Dara’s emergence provokes rival Pathan gang members, and soon matters get personal, igniting a bloody face-off.

episodes.name: Baptised by Fire
episodes.overview: After Dara attempts to dethrone Haji-Pathan-Anna - the reigning kings of the Bombay underworld - a series of violent events leads to unexpected alliances and a brutal wedding night.

episodes.name: Crown of Thorns
episodes.overview: After a devastating personal attack, Dara seeks revenge and ignites a deadly turf war against Haji and the Pathans.

episodes.name: Thy Kingdom Come
episodes.overview: Dara recognizes an opportunity to move up in the world thanks to a newly forged alliance with the Dubai Sheikhs. This marks the birth of D Company.

episodes.name: Battle of Blood
episodes.overview: As Dara's empire expands with the Dubai Sheikhs, family tensions rise and a revengeful Pathan threatens to bring him down.

episodes.name: Hell Hath no Fury
episodes.overview: D Company is under attack; Dara suffers a deadly personal blow. With tensions escalating between the two gangs, body counts rise and the stakes get higher. Dara enlists a fearless hitman.

episodes.name: In the Name of the Father
episodes.overview: Dara ruthlessly pushes on to decimate Pathan and Anna in an end game. But finally, to escape arrest Dara must make the ultimate sacrifice.

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: Bambai Meri Jaan chronicles the life of gangster Dara Kadri through the eyes of his father, an ex-cop, Ismail Kadri. In this season, we see how Dara puts everything on the line, including his family. He goes on to become a cold-blooded, fearless gangster who uses his business acumen to fight not only the police and his rivals but also his own demons along the way.
